instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to use the custom colors defined in 'colors.palette'. Override the default shadcn variables in 'index.css' to match the dark theme (#1a1a1a background).
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css'. Apply 'font-serif' (Playfair) to all Headings and 'font-sans' (Montserrat) to body.
4. LAYOUT: Build the 'Hero' section first. It must be visually striking. Use the 'texture' SVG as a background overlay.
5. GALLERY: Implement the 'SignatureGallery' using a CSS Grid or Masonry layout. Use the provided image URLs.
6. INTERACTION: Add the 'FloatingCTA' button for WhatsApp (Link: https://wa.me/41985067554).
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, links, inputs).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are mandatory for this luxury aesthetic.
